lexUnit.name: confirm.v

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: FN: give assurance of the validity of something.

sentence.text: I can also confirm to my hon. Friend that we have made no plans for a super increase in VAT , as the Opposition have apparently considered .
When he confirmed to Hankey that this was a ` command " , the latter replied ; ` Very well , Sire .
I 'll confirm to you today .
A BBC spokesman confirmed her departure , but the way may be left clear for Mrs Hewitt to return to Walford and put a spring back in henpecked Arthur 's step .
A Scotland Yard spokesman confirmed that the new claims were being investigated .
Western military sources confirmed that Turkey had the military capability to carry out an air raid on the Bekaa .
On Feb. 9 the US administration confirmed that some US$107,000,000 of US aid to Jordan had been placed under review .
Can my hon. Friend confirm that it is the Government 's intention to continue to reduce taxes and deregulate , both of which will help small businesses ?
A row blew up as he confirmed that he will obey the German and EC deadline and rush through the Maastricht Bill in the Commons ` by next summer " .
The bids confirmed that they were best to hang on to them and they will now be refurbished and pole-mounted at the entrance to the Museum .
The revisions should preferably be confirmed in writing .
On 24 January 1992 the local authority confirmed that decision in writing .
It should be confirmed in writing .
I confirm that the Government 's nerve will hold in the context of the twin track of political progress and a robust security policy conducted under the rule of law .
Will he confirm that the occupation is illegal and that all settlements on the west bank are illegal ?
Gloucestershire Police confirmed today that they have questioned the pair .
Chris Waddle confirmed he would leave Marseille at the end of the season .
And Scotland Yard confirmed it was not getting involved .
If this can be confirmed , it would be an invaluable adjunct to provenance studies .

On 19 December 2003 , Libyan leader Col. Muammar Qadhafi publicly confirmed his commitment to disclose and dismantle WMD programs in his country following a nine-month period of negotiations with US and UK authorities .
On October 20, 2004 , Iranian Defense Minister Ali Shamkhani confirmed the latest successful test of Iran 's Shehab-3 with a 2,000 - kilometer range in front of observers .
The PRC confirms that it has sold an electromagnetic separator and a mini - reactor to Iran .
US officials confirmed that they have evidence that Iran intends to acquire nuclear weapons .
On 10 February 2005 , the North Korean Foreign Ministry confirmed Li 's statement by announcing that Pyongyang had manufactured nuclear weapons .
Open sources reported that the Russian Minister of Atomic Energy confirmed that discussions over supplying Syria with a power plant and a desalination plant were taking place .
Once his tears have subsided , he confirms what his classmates have already figured out : he just received a job offer -- his first in five years .
